titleStmt.title: The modest critick, or, Remarks upon the most eminent historians, antient and modern with useful cautions and instructions as well for writing as reading history : wherein the sense of the greatest men on this subject is faithfully abridged / by one of the Society of the Port-Royal.
titleStmt.author: One of the Society of the Port-Royal.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
